name: In The Dark Early Demo
description: Grab a Flashlight, and some batteries, because today you're gonna turn the light back on in the Dark World, a world that is engulfed with endless darkness, your goal: defeat the 4 bosses that keep the world in darkness. In this early demo you can go to your bedroom, Living room, and an early version of the darkness world currently there is no way to save or exit with the escape button, so use alt+F4, there is no menu either so you'll go straight into the game.
